name: Syncthing Dark
description: An inverted style for the Syncthing web interface, with light font on dark background. Meaningful colors are preserved as much as possible (e.g. red for errors, yellow for warnings...), but I might have missed some corner cases. Feedback is welcome.
additional_info: The web interface is assumed to be on port 8384, which is currently the default setting. If you have the Syncthing UI running on a different port, or you want to restrict this theme to some hosts only, edit the -moz-document command accordingly.
